SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class AIHelperUtility

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.AIHelperUtility
public class AIHelperUtility extends Object
A utility class that assists with inserting rich content (text, images, hyperlinks) into a CustomStyledArea. It also provides functionality to parse structured JSON input (e.g. from AI) and apply content and styles accordingly.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new AIHelperUtility bound to the given CustomStyledArea.

  • Method Details

    • insertText

      public void insertText(String text, TextStyle style)
      Appends a plain text segment to the editor with the specified style.
      Parameters:
      text - the text content to insert
      style - the TextStyle to apply to the text

    • insertParagraph

      public void insertParagraph(String text, TextStyle style, ParStyle parStyle)
      Appends a paragraph with both text and paragraph style to the editor.
      Parameters:
      text - the text content of the paragraph
      style - the TextStyle for text formatting
      parStyle - the ParStyle for paragraph formatting (alignment, list type, etc.)

    • insertImage

      public void insertImage(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Inserts an image into the editor.
      Parameters:
      image - the JavaFX Image to insert

    • insertHyperlink

      public void insertHyperlink(String text, String url)
      Inserts a hyperlink segment with the given display text and URL.
      Parameters:
      text - the visible text
      url - the hyperlink URL

    • applyJsonInstructions

      public void applyJsonInstructions(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode nodes) throws IOException
      Applies a sequence of JSON instructions to the editor. Each node in the array should specify a type ("text", "image", or "hyperlink") and relevant content and style.
      Parameters:
      nodes - the root array node containing content instructions
      Throws:
      IOException - if a node is malformed

    • applyJsonInstruction

      public void applyJsonInstruction(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node) throws IOException
      Applies a single JSON instruction to the editor. Supports types: "text", "image", "hyperlink".
      Parameters:
      node - the JSON node representing one content block
      Throws:
      IOException - if the node is invalid

    • parseParStyle

      public static ParStyle parseParStyle(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode parStyleNode)
      Parses a JSON node into a ParStyle object.
      Parameters:
      parStyleNode - the JSON node representing paragraph style
      Returns:
      the resulting ParStyle, or ParStyle.EMPTY if null or invalid
